MultipleAspectsAtOnce.Description: At levels 9, 14 and 20 allow 2, 3, 4 aspects enabled at the same time.

AddAirborneToForms.Description: Add Airborne property to dragon forms given by class.

IncreaseFormStatBonuses.Description: Increase STR/CON bonuses provided by dragon forms given by class by 0/2/4.

AddBiteAttack.Description: Add at lvl 4 bite attack with 1.5 STR bonus.

IncreaseFormBiteStrBonus.Description: Make class dragon form bite attack use 1.5 STR bonus.

AddWings.Description: Add at lvl 5 wings that are active when dragon aspect is active and match the color of last activated aspect.

ApplyGDBonuses.Description: Make Thousand Bites spell affect Gold and Black dragon forms of lvl 20 shifter.

FixGDSpellMetamagicTags.Description: Allows applying metamagic to mythic GD spells where tags were missing.

ArmorEnhancementBonusToBypassDR.Description: Use armor enhancement bonus for DR penetration in Heavy and Medium mythic offense feats. I.e. bonus damage from +5 heavy armor counts as if it came from +5 weapon.
